body:
Anyone seen this message on rad-generated rpiece runs lately?  I just 
saw on one of the eight-core systems on our big cluster and I'm 
wondering if anyone else has seen it.


I'm running the CVS version of Radiance, so it could be that I just 
built on a bad day.


Randolph M. Fritz • RFritz at lbl.gov
Environmental Energy Technologies Division • Lawrence Berkeley Labs
___
